TopicTitle: Here's An Idea, LEGO Star Trek

Articles.Content: A simple poll on whether LEGO should release Star Trek sets. I personally would like to see a set of either Voyager, or Voyager's interior.
i bet the mouse has a clause in their star wars agreements that says they cant make star trek sets. cant support the competition now.

This is a great idea. I'm sure they could work out the competition issue. I mean, LEGO does both the Marvel and DC universe properties.

The real problem is the ownership issues that surround the Star Trek brand between Paramount, CBS, and formerly Viacom.
